1371: Menzone was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1371.
1378: Lost sibling Mattheus in 1378 when Mattheus was 2.
1384: Lost sibling Moys in 1384 when Moys was 11.
1385: Lost father at the age of 14.
1390: Lost mother at the age of 19.
Lost sibling Rampe in 1390 when Rampe was 15.
1391: Lost sibling Pieter in 1391 when Pieter was 20.
1394: Got married to Waldrada at age 24 in 1394.
Menzone moved to Muurhuysen1.B.2 after marriage.
1396: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Esa, at age 25.
1397: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Segherarden, at age 26.
1398: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Iris, at age 27.
